MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.DiscreteDistribution Class Reference

Declares common functionality for all discrete random number distributions based on a random source. More...

 Gets a value indicating whether the random number distribution can be reset, so that it produces the same random number sequence again.

Detailed Description

Declares common functionality for all discrete random number distributions based on a random source.
